article.headline: Grambling St. 86, Texas Southern 83
article.story: HOUSTON -- Andrew Priestley's two free throws with six seconds remaining put Grambling State past Texas Southern in a 86-83 overtime victory Monday night. Ariece Perkins scored 20 points, Donald Qualls made 18, nine from 3-pointers, and Priestley contributed 13 points for Grambling (5-12, 3-3 Southwestern Athletic). Jamal Breaux added 10. The game went into overtime tied 71-71. Ricky Boyles had a double-double with 23 points and 10 rebounds for Texas Southern (1-17, 1-4 ). Jacques Jones scored 14, Matthew Miller had 13 and Deandre Hall scored 12 points. Miller missed a 3-pointer with two seconds on the clock in overtime.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
